thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Montmartre 18eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Ibis Paris Montmartre 18eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lee t
title: Great location
text:
This was our first time to Paris for our 10 year wedding anniversary and we are really happy we choose this hotel.
The location is just great for seeing all the sights right next to the Moulin Rouge and close to the Sacre Coeur
Check in was so easy and fast great the staff very friendly and spoke perfect English no trouble at all
And the finally lovely touch was the Champagne and cakes in our room for our anniversary making good our break more special thanks to the Ibis staff
